howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From Resume to Recruiter-Ready AI in Minutes
howItWorks.description: Our streamlined process makes it effortless to launch your personalized career chatbot.

step1.title: Upload your CV
step1.description: Simply drag and drop your existing resume or LinkedIn profile. Our platform securely accepts multiple file formats.
features: PDF, DOCX, or plain text files

step2.title: Answer your personalized Questions
step2.description: Get a tailored set of questions based on your CV, skills, and career goals to help your AI chatbot sound more accurate and professional.
features: Crafted uniquely from your uploaded CV
Enhances the chatbot’s accuracy and personality

step3.title: CV AI Bot Creating
step3.description: Our advanced AI platform takes your resume, skills, and experience to create a conversational AI bot that truly understands you.
features: Fast, accurate, and ready in 15 minutes

step4.title: Share with Recruiters
step4.description: Easily share your AI-powered CV chatbot with hiring managers through a short link or QR code for faster, smarter evaluations.
features: Send a short link or QR instantly
Make your profile stand out during screening
Allow recruiters to chat and explore your experience anytime
